comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body:
The Mad King’s Realm is a strange place which has confounded our skritt cartographers for years. It’s unlikely that we’ll ever have tiles for it. Same, more-or-less, for Wintersday.

Ascent to Madness should now be in the maps endpoint though.

comments.author: Reincarnated.1754
comments.body:
The Tile Service

Returned Map ID’s:
Mad King’s Labyrinth = 866 — All looks OK
Mad King’s Clock Tower = 865 — All looks OK
Ascent to Madness = 863 — Does not appear to exist.

PS. any eta on Lion’s Arch
